questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging's background, visually prominent and encompassing the majority of the visible surface?
Considering the overall shape, what geometric form best describes the product's packaging?
What material appears to be used for the product's primary packaging, judging by its visual properties?
Focusing on the text, what is the primary purpose or use indicated for this product, based purely on the visible text?
Based on the visible text, what is one specific symptom that this product temporarily relieves, as explicitly stated?
Observing the text layout, what is the most prominent label section on the packaging, in terms of size and placement?
What is the color of the text on the drug facts panel of this product's packaging?
Considering the texture of the package, what surface quality is predominantly apparent from the image?
What is the most visually striking graphic element or design feature used on the packaging besides text?
Judging from its visual qualities, what is the apparent finish or coating of the packaging material?
Focusing on the text's organization, what is the label section adjacent to the 'Purpose' section?
Observing the packaging's layout, what is the visual style or design approach used in the presentation of information?
What type of information, depicted on the packaging, provides specific instructions related to usage and cautions?
What is the visual style of the font used on the packaging, based purely on visual characteristics?
What is the visible text used to denote the most critical information on the product?
